event.title: FSFE local group Berlin meeting, Germany

body.p:
The FSFE local group Berlin is having its regular monthly meeting on the second Thursday of March. Anyone interested in software freedom is welcome at the Kieztreff Undine in Hagenstra√üe 57 not far from S+U-Lichtenberg station.
The meeting is starting at 18h and mostly in German but English can be spoken as well.
Bring good vibes with you.
